## ``hc_theme_gridlight``
Grid Light theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Grid Light theme for highcharts

##### Usage

<pre><code>
  hc_theme_gridlight(...)
</code></pre>
  
  
#### Arguments 

* ``...``: Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples

```{r}`
highcharts_demo() %>%
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_gridlight())
```
